categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Lexa Tcheil was a female human Jedi youngling that was part of the Jedi Order's Bear Clan shortly prior to the outbreak of the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and Confederacy of Independent Systems. She and her clan were present with Grand Master Yoda when Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi entered the chamber seeking help to find the planet Kamino.
